description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Paradox - A game that pits your wits against the cosmos. Match blocks together as they funnel into a time-space rip to get a higher score. The higher your score gets the harder the game becomes. Play across three different modes of play, and hone your skills to become a true Paradox Champion.
description.short: Paradox - A game that pits your wits against the cosmos. Match blocks together as they funnel into a time-space rip to get a higher score. The higher your score gets the harder the game becomes. Play across three different modes of play, and hone your skills to become a true Paradox Champion.
